title: Phylaster, or, Loue lyes a bleeding acted at the Globe by His Maiesties seruants / written by [brace] Francis Baymont and Iohn Fletcher ...
author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
publisher: For Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Eagle and Child in Brittaines Bursse,
notes: Errors in paging: p. 12, 44 and 46 misnumbered 14, 42 and 64 respectively.
Identified as STC 1681 at reel position 1194:15.
Reproduction of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
